description: The patient encounter communication management table stores communication details for a patient. It contains recipient, sender, and communication information for communications created and sent using the communication management module.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_HOUSE_NO
columns.description: Communication recipient house number

columns.name: COMM_SENT_DISTRCT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the district in the communication recipient's address.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: COMM_SENT_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the county in the communication recipient's address.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: COMM_SENT_UID_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who sent the communication.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_INST
columns.description: The instant when the communication was sent.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_INI
columns.description: The record type of the communication's recipient, for example SER for provider, DEP for department, etc.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_SER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider record for the communication recipient.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_TO_NAME
columns.description: Communication recipient name

columns.name: COMM_SENT_FAX
columns.description: Communication recipient fax number

columns.name: COMM_SENT_PHONE
columns.description: Communication recipient phone number

columns.name: COMM_SENT_ADDR
columns.description: Communication recipient address

columns.name: COMM_SENT_CITY
columns.description: Communication recipient city

columns.name: COMM_SENT_STATE
columns.description: Communication recipient state.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_ZIP
columns.description: Communication recipient zip code.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_COUNTRY
columns.description: Communication recipient country

columns.name: COMM_SENT_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value for the method used to send the communication.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


In Basket


Fax


Mail


Phone Call


MyChart


Network Printer


Courier Service


Outside Provider Messaging


Print Locally


EDI


Opt Out


E-mail


FHIR


Save to File

columns.name: COMM_SENT_LTR_NUM
columns.description: Letter number of the communication sent

columns.name: COMM_SENT_RPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the report sent with the communication.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_RPT_ID_REPORT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the report

columns.name: COMM_SENT_OTH_BLBID
columns.description: Blob ID of the communication sent

columns.name: COMM_SENT_LTR_BLOB
columns.description: Letter blob of the communication sent. Only applies to communications sent via fax.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_RPT_BLOB
columns.description: Report blob of the communication sent. Only applies to communications sent via fax.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Communication sent status category number for the communication.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Ready


Ready To Send


Sent


New Job


Support Staff


Voided


Sent & Acknowledged

columns.name: COMM_SENT_JOB_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the communication job.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_BY_USR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user (EMP) who actually sent the communication from the communication management module.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_SER_ADDR
columns.description: Stores the selected address ID if the recipient is a provider

columns.name: COMM_ROUTING_MESSG
columns.description: The routing message included when the communication is routed to support staff.

columns.name: OR_LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log (ORL) record associated with the communication note.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_HNO_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note (HNO) record associated with the communication note.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_EMP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user (EMP) record for the communication recipient.

columns.name: COMM_IS_OVERDUE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the communication has been waiting for either transcriptions, results, or both, and is now overdue. A Y indicates that it is overdue. N indicates that the communication is not overdue.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: COMM_PREV_LETTER_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the communication is using a previously sent letter. A Y indicates that the communication is using a previously sent letter. N indicates that the communication is not using a previously sent letter.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: COMM_IS_OVERDUE_YN

columns.name: COMM_WAIT_FOR_TX_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether the communication is waiting for transcriptions.  Yes indicates that the communication is waiting for transcriptions, No indicates that the communication is not waiting for transcriptions, and Resulted indicates that the communication was waiting for a transcription that has since been completed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Resulted

columns.name: COMM_WAIT_FOR_RES_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether the communication is waiting for results. Yes indicates that the communication is waiting for results, No indicates that the communication is not waiting for results, and Resulted indicates the communication was waiting for results that have since been resulted.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Resulted

columns.name: COMM_SENT_DIR_ADDR
columns.description: This is the Direct address to which a communication is sent.

columns.name: COMM_CREATED_MTH_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the communication's creation method. "Automatic on Close Encounter" means the communication was created from an automatic communication when the encounter was closed and has not been sent yet. "ED Discharge" is for automatic communications created upon discharge from the emergency department. "IP Discharge" is for automatic communications created upon discharge from an inpatient admission. "Order Transmittal" is for automatic communications created based on order transmittal rules when an order is signed. "Referral Transmittal" is for automatic communications created with referral workqueue functionality. Otherwise, communications created with the Communication Management  navigator section or activity will have the "Standard" value.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Standard


Automatic on Close Encounter


Additional


By interface for full letter dictations


ED Discharge


Continued Care and Services Coordination


IP Discharge


Order Transmittal


Referral Transmittal


Event Notification


ED Event Change Filing Extension


Flowsheets


Payer Communication


ED Notification


Referral Notification


SC Decision Letter


Chart Abstraction


Bulk Letters


Waitlist Letters


Referral Fax with Attachment


Specialty Plan of Care


ED Excuse Letter


SOTE Patient Refusal Letter


Referral Notification w/ Consent


Medication Therapy Management


Canto Regular Comms


Canto Quick Comms


Form Filler Auto Print


Outside Message


HOV Completion


Automatic Action Letter Notification


HH Plan of Care Update Message


Hospice Non-Covered Document


Imaging Reminder Letter

columns.name: COMM_CE_SUB_MTHD_C_NAME
columns.description:
This is the sub routing method when the routing method "Outside provider messaging" is used in a communication.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


None


Outgoing Direct Address


EpicCare Link Direct Address


MedCom


PCEHR


Kanta


Pika XML

columns.name: COMM_SENT_EMAIL
columns.description: Communication recipient email

columns.name: COMM_PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Communication priority


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


High


Routine


Low

columns.name: COMM_SOURCE_RFL_ID
columns.description: Stores a referral ID associated with a transition of care communication.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_INSTANT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Communication sent instant in UTC format

columns.name: COMM_UPDATE_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant (in UTC) at which the associated communication was last updated.

columns.name: COMM_VOID_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Selected reason for voiding this communication


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Incorrect recipient; replacement needed


Incorrect recipient; no replacement needed


Wrong patient


Wrong encounter


Sent accidentally


Excuse letter removed


Excuse letter modified


Negative Acknowledgment


Missing Acknowledgment

columns.name: COMM_VOID_USER_ID
columns.description: User (EMP) ID of user who voided this communication

columns.name: COMM_VOID_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant (in UTC) at which this communication was voided

columns.name: CONSENT_DOC_INFO_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the document (DCS) record which grants patient consent for sending the message.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_EAF_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the facility (EAF) record for the communication recipient.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_HIP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the registry (HIP) record for the communication recipient.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_HIP_ID_REGISTRY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the In Basket registry in the HIP master file.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_DEP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department (DEP) record for the communication recipient.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_AGY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the agency (AGY) record for the communication recipient.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_AGY_ID_AGENCY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the agency.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_DXO_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the data exchange organization (DXO) record for the communication recipient.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_DXO_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.

columns.name: COMM_RES_CMT
columns.description: Indicates what was done to resolve the negative or missing acknowledgment
